name: Breakfast Pies
author: CRANEJWR
summary: Individual breakfast pies that can be made ahead of time, and microwaved as needed. My 3 year old grandson loves them, and they are finger food for the little ones. The big guys love them too. I fix hash browns and gravy as side dishes for the big guys, and it is a huge hit!
ingredients: ⅛ cup minced green bell pepper
½ cup shredded Colby-Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat, combine sausage, onion and green pepper
Cook until sausage is evenly brown
Separate the dough into 10 individual biscuits
Flatten each biscuit out, then line the bottom and sides of 10 muffin cups
Evenly distribute sausage mixture between the cups
Mix together the eggs and milk, and divide between the cups
Bake in preheated oven for 18 to 20 minutes, or until filling is set
